content:
Ekaathmajadevaa!-nyaan nin
Krpayude kadalil nokkunnen
Enkadameri-paapam peruthaayi
Nin soppaayenmel pooshee-
Tten mizhineeraal venmayezhaan
Kezhunnen nin-janakasnehatthaal
En vairikall modicheedaa
Thanuthaapamezhum paathakiyil
Doothasamooham-modichothatte
Pashchaatthaapamiyannore
Raapakal vaathil thurannettum
Haaleluyyaa -naathhan vaazhtthudayon.

Moolyamithaa tharanam thailam
Vyaapaariyodevam parayum
Paapini thante-naadam bahumadhuram
Nalkuka mettharamaam thailam
Nyaanathilen mizhineer chertthi-
Ttekaathmajane-yabhishekikkatte
Ipparimalla thailatthaal nyaan
Paapavimochana maarnnidume
Nnen daivatthil prathyaashikkunnen
Avall thailam vaangichennaall
Vishvaasam darshichudayon
Haaleluyya........... Paapakshama nalki.

Aardratha thonnaname naathhaa!
Ikkarmmam kaikkollllaname
Mochanavum krpayum vaazhvum
Ninnariyeennekeedaname.

Praarththhippaan nee nilkkumpoll
Santaapatthodekaagram
Chintakallekkadinyaanittu
Chitthatthil nirtthidenam.

Nin vaayu dhoopatthin kalasham
Ninnadharam dhoopam hrdyam
Daivatthe preenippikkum
Naavo shushrooshakkaaran

Praarththhana ketteedunnone!
Yaachana nalkeedunnone!
Praarththhana kettu nirannanpaal
Yaachanaye nalkeedaname.
